synopsis.text: Neverland, a realm of enchantment and peril, is the backdrop for a tale of love, duty, and courage. In the snow-covered kingdom of Fredbarn, Ellile, a knight-in-training, and Princess Roji harbor a clandestine love, their hearts yearning for a future together. However, Lifile, the seasoned knight commander, casts doubt on Ellile's ability to protect Roji and the kingdom, leaving Ellile grappling with self-doubt and uncertainty. As the looming threat of war with the demons intensifies, the stakes for Ellile and Roji's forbidden love rise higher. Amidst the turmoil, a fourth character, Poro, and her robot companion add a touch of whimsy to the unfolding saga, intertwining with the lives of the Generation of Chaos Next cast. Will Ellile rise to the challenge, proving himself a worthy protector and lover, or will the pressures of war and societal norms shatter their dreams? Only time will tell in this captivating prologue to the second installment of the Generation of Chaos RPG series.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
